ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Oz: Reign of the Witch Queen
ComicInfo.Summary:
The epic OZ trilogy CONTINUES!
With Warlord finally ensnared in their trap, Dorothy Gale, Thorne, Smynth, and Adraste unleash their combined might against the Destroyer of Hope! But even with Zamora distracted in distant Abraxas, Warlord seems poised to crush their hopes once again... unless someone makes the ultimate sacrifice. Magic, warfare, and sudden-but-inevitable betrayals reign in the Land of Oz!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Richard Ortiz & Ylenia di Napoli | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Paul Green | 3 | D | Cover D | Antonio Bifulco & Wes Hartman | 4 | E | Wizard World Chicago Comic Con Exclusive, Limited to 500 | Eric Basaldua & Ula Mos | 5 | F | Wizard World Chicago Comic Con Exclusive, Limited to 250 | Eric Basaldua & Ula Mos | 6 | G | Wizard World Chicago Comic Con Exclusive, Limited to 100 | Eric Basaldua & Ula Mos | Missing |
